alert.note: Alert for Early; Miller (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Dale, Henry, Houston, western Miller and western Early Counties through 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/... At 742 PM EDT/642 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blue Springs State Park to Headland to Ashford. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Cottonwood, Headland, Dothan, Blakely, Ozark, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Columbia, Pinckard, Centerville, Grimes, Avon, Newville and Napier Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
